resources.string:
Mirrors

Description

There are two mirrors : an horizontal and a vertical. If you enabled the horizontal or the vertical mirror, your stroke will be reflected respectively horizontally or vertically. You can enable both in the same time but you can not enable the Kaleidoscope effect and the mirrors.

Kaleidoscope

Description

This effect will rotate your stroke around the canvas center several times. The default rotation number is 6 and can be chosen in the extra settings. You can not enabled a mirror effect and the kaleidoscope in the same time.

Fill

Description

Your strokes will create filled shapes and not lines anymore. Click again on the icon to go back in the stroke mode. Some brushes do not support the fill mode and will use only the stroke mode.

Stroke

Description

Your strokes will create line. Click on the icon to go in the fill mode.

Unicolor

Description

Your stroke will only use the main color (see Colors). Click on the icon to enter in gradient mode.

Gradient

Description

A linear gradient from top left to bottom right using both the main and the secondary colors will colorize your stroke. If you use a mirror or kaleidoscope effect, the gradient will be affected as well. Click on the icon to go back in the unicolor mode.
